attributes.action: Give us the right to do everything in our power to reclaim a civilized Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are sick to the eye balls of criminals,spongers and louts having more rights than the normal, hard working,decent poeple of this great land.
Its time for these drags of society, who are bleeding us all dry, pay the debt that they owe.
We all have the right to walk the street of this great land without fear and with pride, lets get the Great back in GREAT BRITAIN

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
